info.name: iPaymu Public API v2
info.description: - Url Live/Production: [https://my.ipaymu.com](https://my.ipaymu.com) - Url Development/Sandbox: [https://sandbox.ipaymu.com](https://sandbox.ipaymu.com) **Sample Generate Signature:** - PHP ([https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-php](https://github.com/putuedi/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-php)) - NodeJS ([https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-nodejs](https://github.com/putuedi/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-nodejs)) - Python ([https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-python](https://github.com/putuedi/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-python)) - Golang ([https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-go](https://github.com/putuedi/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-go)) - Dotnet C# ([https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-dotnet](https://github.com/putuedi/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-dotnet)) - Ruby ([https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-ruby](https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-ruby)) - Java ([https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-java](https://github.com/ipaymu/ipaymu-payment-v2-sample-java)) **Catatan:** - VA dan Api Key bisa didapatkan pada menu Integrasi di dashboard iPaymu Anda. - VA dan Api Key Mode Sandbox/Development berbeda dengan VA dan Api Key Mode Production/Live. - Jika mendapatkan kendala integrasi silakan hubungi [support@ipaymu.com](https://mailto:support@ipaymu.com) atau WhatsApp [https://wa.link/p8vnr7](https://wa.link/p8vnr7) **Notes:** • VA and Api Key can be found in the Integration menu on your iPaymu dashboard. • VA and Api Key Mode Sandbox/Development are different with VA and Api Key Mode Production/Live. • If you have problem for integration, please contact [support@ipaymu.com](https://mailto:support@ipaymu.com) or via WhatsApp [https://wa.link/p8vnr7](https://wa.link/p8vnr7)

formdata.description: Notify URL for receive webhook from iPaymu. (iPaymu will send param in POST method to this URL when buyer make a payment)

Payment method. Value:
- Virtual Account => 'va'
- Convenience Store => 'cstore'
- COD => 'cod'
- Pay Later => 'paylater'
- QRIS => 'qris'

Payment channel of the payment method
* Virtual Account (va)
  - BAG => 'bag'
  - BCA => 'bca'
  - BNI => 'bni'
  - Cimb Niaga => 'cimb'
  - Mandiri => 'mandiri'
  - Muamalat => 'bmi'
  - BRI => 'bri'
  - BSI => 'bsi'
  - Permata => 'permata'

* Bank Transfer (banktransfer)
  - BCA => 'bca'

* Convenience Store (cstore)
  - Alfamart => 'alfamart'
  - Indomaret => 'indomaret'

* Cash On Delivery (cod)
  - Kurir RPX => 'rpx'

* Pay Later (paylater)
  - Akulaku => 'akulaku'

* QRIS (qris)
  - qris => 'qris'
Weight product in kg  (for COD payment) (nullable)
Width product in cm (for COD payment) (nullable)
Height product in cm (for COD payment) (nullable)
Length product in cm (for COD payment) (nullable)

formdata.description: mandatory - Notify URL for receive webhook from iPaymu. (iPaymu will send param in POST method to this URL when buyer make a payment)

mandatory - Payment method. Value:
- Virtual Account => 'va'
- Convenience Store => 'cstore'
- COD => 'cod'
- QRIS => 'qris'
- Credit Card => 'cc'
- Pay Later => 'paylater'

mandatory - Payment channel of the payment method
* Virtual Account (va)
  - BAG => bag
  - BCA => bca
  - BPD Bali => bpd_bali
  - BNI => bni
  - Cimb Niaga => cimb
  - Mandiri => mandiri
  - Muamalat => bmi
  - BRI => bri
  - BSI => bsi
  - Permata =>permata
  - Danamon => danamon

* Convenience Store (cstore)
  - Alfamart => alfamart
  - Indomaret => indomaret

* Cash On Delivery (cod)
  - Kurir RPX => rpx

* QRIS (qris)
  - QRIS => mpm

* Credit Card
  - Credit Card => cc

* Pay Later
  - Akulaku => akulaku

optional - Custom expired payment code in hours 
Nb:
* BSI VA max 3 hours
* BRI VA max 2 hours
* BCA VA can't be customized (default 12 hours)
* Con Store Alfamart can't be customized (default 24 hours)
* QRIS can't be customized (default 24 hours)

optional - Custom fee direction (optional)

- MERCHANT => fee charged to merchant,
- BUYER => fee charged to buyer
conditional - Weight product in kg  (for COD payment)
conditional - Width product in cm (for COD payment)
conditional - Height product in cm (for COD payment) (optional)
conditional - Length product in cm (for COD payment)
conditional - Delivery postal code (for COD payment)
conditional - Shipping name from API Shipping Calculate (for COD payment)
conditional - Service name from API Shipping Calculate (for COD payment)
optional - Success URL after payment (case redirect payment Akulaku & Credit Card)
optional - Cancel URL for failed payment (case redirect payment optional - Akulaku & Credit Card)

item.description: **Unauthorized Credential** - **Error Message:** `unauthorized`, `401` - **Description:** Usually happens when using wrong credentials or mixing sandbox and production credentials - **Solutions:** Ensure you're using the correct VA and API Key for the environment (sandbox vs production) **Unauthorized Signature** - **Error Message:** `{"Message":"unauthorized signature"}`, `401` - **Description:** Can be caused by illegal characters that interfere with signature generation (like \` or special quotes) or sending data with null values - **Solutions:** Remove special characters from parameters, ensure no null values, verify signature generation process **Invalid Domain** - **Error Message:** `invalid domain`, `406` - **Description:** Occurs when return url, cancel url, or notify url are not registered in the dashboard - **Solutions:** Register all domains in your iPaymu dashboard; for production, domains need activation - **Reference:** [https://blog.ipaymu.com/mengatasi-masalah-error-invalid-ip-domain-di-ipaymu/](https://blog.ipaymu.com/mengatasi-masalah-error-invalid-ip-domain-di-ipaymu/) **Production IP & Domain Requirements** - **IP Check:** Production has IP validation - user needs static IP registered to dashboard - **Domain Activation:** Multiple domains can be registered but require activation request - **Outgoing IP:** Ensure registered IP is the one making requests to iPaymu - **Domain Validation:** URLs must be registered and activated in dashboard for production use

request.description:
API ini berfungsi untuk mengetahui informasi transaksi, termasuk status dan nilai transaksi secara realtime.  
Status transaksi yang bisa dianggap berhasil bisa dilihat pada response parameter:  
Data->Status: 1 atau 6 atau 7

formdata.description:
-2 => Expired,
0 => Pending,
1 => Berhasil,
2 => Batal,
3 => Refund,
4 => Error,
5 => Gagal,
6 => Berhasil - Unsettled,
7 => Escrow,

- created_at => filter by transaction created date
- indate => filter by transaction paid date

- 0 => Mutasi
- 2 => Penarikan
- 5 => Komisi
- 7 => Bank Transfer/VA
- 10 => COD
- 11 => Convenience Store
- 20 => Pindah Saldo
- 22 => Akulaku
- 23 => QRIS
- 24 => EDC
- 27 => QRIS Payment

- id => transaction id
- created_at => filter by transaction created date
- indate => filter by transaction paid date

request.description: API untuk melihat data riwayat transaksi iPaymu.

formdata.description:
-2 => Expired
0 => Pending
1 => Berhasil
2 => Batal
3 => Refund
4 => Error
5 => Gagal
6 => Berhasil - Unsettled
7 => Escrow

header.value: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * data: blob: 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src *; style-src * 'unsafe-inline';

formdata.description:
-2 => Expired
0 => Pending
1 => Berhasil
2 => Batal
3 => Refund
4 => Error
5 => Gagal
6 => Berhasil - Unsettled
7 => Escrow

header.value: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * data: blob: 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src *; style-src * 'unsafe-inline';

response.name: Success

formdata.description:
-2 => Expired,
0 => Pending,
1 => Berhasil,
2 => Batal,
3 => Refund,
4 => Error,
5 => Gagal,
6 => Berhasil - Unsettled,
7 => Escrow,

- created_at => filter by transaction created date
- indate => filter by transaction paid date

- 0 => Mutasi
- 2 => Penarikan
- 5 => Komisi
- 7 => Bank Transfer/VA
- 10 => COD
- 11 => Convenience Stora
- 20 => Pindah Saldo
- 22 => Akulaku
- 23 => QRIS
- 24 => EDC
- 27 => QRIS Payment

- id => transaction id
- created_at => filter by transaction created date
- indate => filter by transaction paid date

header.value: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * data: blob: 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src *; style-src * 'unsafe-inline';

exec: // Dynamic global pre-request script for iPaymu API v2
// Ini akan secara otomatis menghasilkan signature untuk semua endpoint iPaymu
// Ambil nilai apiKey dan va dari environment
// Validasi bahwa apikey dan va tersedia
console.error('apiKey atau va tidak ditemukan di environment variables');
// Fungsi untuk menghasilkan signature berdasarkan tipe request
// Ambil body data berdasarkan tipe konten
console.log('Body bukan JSON atau tidak valid');
// Handle form urlencoded dengan normalisasi array
// Normalisasi field array (misalnya product[], qty[] menjadi product, qty sebagai array)
// Jika nilainya berisi koma, maka pecah jadi array
// Jika bukan field array yang dikenali, tetap jadikan array
// Handle form data dengan normalisasi array
// Normalisasi field array (misalnya product[], qty[] menjadi product, qty sebagai array)
// Jika nilainya berisi koma, maka pecah jadi array
// Jika bukan field array yang dikenali, tetap jadikan array
// Buat JSON string dari data - format kompak tanpa spasi
console.log('Data yang digunakan untuk signature:', reqJson);
const stringToSign = method.toUpperCase() + ':' + va + ':' + bodyEncrypt + ':' + apikey;
// Generate signature dan simpan ke environment variable
